version_description:
- No more audio cut off when applying video filter
- Bug fix and performance improvements

- No more crashing while exporting video collage with filter applied
- Bug fix and performance improvements
- Bug fix and performance improvements
- Bug fix and performance improvements

** 重要!!!
** 如果更新后的应用程序崩溃，删除应用程序，并从App Store重新安装！

- iCloud的照片库中的bug修复

- Support for iOS9 Smart Albums
- Bug fix and performance improvements
Bug fix
- 最后，它支持iPad的拆分视图。享受多任务！
- Bug fix
- Bug fix
- Bug Fix

有史以来最大和最大的更新！

• 全自动照片拼贴
• 支持实时照片和GIF
• 视频中的视频
• 添加表情符号作为拼贴的贴纸
• 按日期浏览图像
• 更高的照片分辨率与最近的设备
• 性能增强
• Bug修复

• 全自动照片拼贴
• 支持实时照片和GIF
• 视频中的视频

有史以来最大和最大的更新！

• 全自动照片拼贴
• 支持实时照片和GIF
• 视频中的视频
• 添加表情符号作为拼贴的贴纸
• 按日期浏览图像
• 更高的照片分辨率与最近的设备
• 免费照片编辑器效果
• 性能增强
• Bug修复

- 最后你可以添加曲线文字拼贴！ 创建独特的拼贴与美丽的弧形文字！
- 在保存或共享之前编辑照片拼贴本身（比如在整个拼贴画中应用过滤器）
- 从相机添加照片和视频
- 从剪贴板添加照片
- 最近的背景
- 最近的文本
- 最近的字体
- 最近的表情
- 最近的贴纸
- Support for iOS11 and new iPhone devices

- Initial menu list redesigned
- Many more layouts
- Support for iOS13
- Support for dark mode
- Minor bug fixes
- Minor enhancements
- Fixed some crash issues.

- Minor UI enhancement
- Minor bug fix
- Minor bug fix

- Image picker enhanced for better user experience.
- Minor bug fix

- Layout misalignment bug fixed
- Open photo from Files app
- Minor bug fix

- New montage collage! Create beautiful montage with powerful object masking tool!
- Enhanced custom sticker generator and editor.
- Icons inside the app enhanced.
- Minor bug fixes and UI enhancement.

- New montage collage! Create beautiful montage with powerful object masking tool!
- Enhanced custom sticker generator and editor.
- Icons inside the app enhanced.
- Minor bug fixes and UI enhancement.
- Minor bug fix

Whole new intelligent editor features!
- Automatic object removal
- Sticker and montage
- Silhouette and montage
- Outline effect
- Hole and montage
- Background blur (aka depth effect)
- Motion blur
- Color splash

And more

- Compatible with iOS14
- Minor bug fix

- Image editor redesigned due to maintenance issue.
- Bug fix for crashing while exporting video with text.
- New crop, rotation and tweak photo editor
- Bug fix for image not being saved on custom background image.

- Image resolution of photo collage and photo slideshow got increased.
- Bug fix for custom stickers not loaded successfully.
- More photo editing components.

- 您可以直接从iOS相册应用创建照片拼贴和视频拼贴！
-新的“软皮”编辑器。 一步创建柔软的皮肤！
- 轻微的UI增强
- 修正了一些小错误

- 您可以直接从iOS相册应用创建照片拼贴和视频拼贴！
-新的“软皮”编辑器。 一步创建柔软的皮肤！
- 轻微的UI增强
- 修正了一些小错误

- New "Circle Bokeh" photo editor. Create beautiful bokeh effect with this amazing feature!
- Minor bug fix
- Minor bug fix

- Bug fix for background pattern size mismatching.
- Minor bug fix.
- Minor UI enhancement.
